The refurbishment of the Neonatal Intensive Care Unit at Borella Castle Street Women's Hospital has been completed, and we've contributed one ventilator to Castle Hospital for emergency pediatric cases. Your assistance will make a significant impact on enhancing healthcare services.

Poor telecommunication signals were a major hindrance to nearly 250 school and university students belonging to 200 families in Wadukanda, Othumba and Mahdowa areas. However, they are now continuing their education uninterrupted as this issue was recently resolved. Thousands of people in other parts of the island also face various issues, and are awaiting our support. Therefore, we kindly request your assistance in lending them a hand in any way possible.
